name: Hero Emblems
summary: Hero Emblems is a JRPG that mixes “Side-Scrolling beat' em up” and “Match-3” features. Set in the middle-ages fantasy world of sword-fighting and wizardry, it is an adventure of 4 brave warriors who wield different emblem powers and their attempts to stop the re-awakening of the God of Evil.
info:
• 中文名: 英雄纹章
  • 平台: iOS
  • 游戏类型: RPG
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 售价: ¥12
